occurrence_rate.description: Occurrence rate = (checklists with species) / (total complete checklists at hotspot)
occurrence_rate.interpretation: Probability of seeing this species on a visit to this hotspot

lift.formula: lift = (detections at hotspot / checklists at hotspot) / (detections countywide / checklists countywide)
lift.interpretation: 1.0 = average for county, 2.0 = 2x better than average, etc.
lift.baseline_note: County baseline is calculated across ALL hotspots, not just those meeting the minimum checklist threshold

files.species/: One JSON file per species (named by 6-letter code) with hotspot rankings and lift values
files.hotspots/: One JSON file per hotspot with species list and lift values
files.index/top_hotspots_by_species.json: Top 5 hotspots per species (keyed by code)
files.index/notable_species_by_hotspot.json: Top 10 high-lift species per hotspot (lift > 2.0, detections > 5)
